skills.name: BURNING SANDS
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• 35% Chance to Taunt the enemy for 2 turns.
• Taunted enemies only attack the taunter.

skills.name: BRACE
desc: • Increase DEF and MR for 2 turns.
• Gain a Heal Shield for 2 turns.
• Heal Shield heals targets based on the damage they receive.
